message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to own a premium item. I'm willing to give you a 50% chance to inspect it before buying, but if you choose to buy without inspection, you'll get a 100% guarantee that it's high-quality. What do you say?
I'd like to inspect the product before making a decision.

I understand you'd like to inspect before buying. Unfortunately, this product is not available for inspection. However, I can offer you a unique opportunity to buy it at the same price of $1000000. I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product if you buy this one. This is a one-time offer. What do you say?
I'm not willing to buy the product without inspection, and the 20% discount on the next product isn't enough to convince me to take the risk.

I see you're being cautious. I'll give you a 30% chance that this product is actually a high-quality item, and the remaining 70% chance it's a low-quality item. I'll also give you a 30% discount on the next product if you buy this one. This is still a one-time offer. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the 30% chance of it being high-quality, and the 30% discount on the next product isn't enough to outweigh the risk.

I'll be more transparent with you. I'm offering this product at a significant loss, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $500000, which is 50% of the original price. I'm not sure if it's a good deal for you, but it's a good deal for me, and I'm willing to take the loss if you're not interested.
I'm still not willing to take the risk of buying a product without inspection, even at a discounted price.

I'll give you a chance to inspect this product before buying. I'll send you a detailed report on its features and specifications, and you can decide if you want to buy it after reviewing the report. If you do decide to buy, I'll give you a 10% discount on the price of $1000000, making it $900000. What do you say?
I'd like to review the report and inspect the product before making a decision.

Congratulations on making a great purchase earlier! I'm glad you're interested in reviewing the report and inspecting the product. For this new product, I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect it first. I'll send you a detailed report on its features and specifications, and you can decide if you want to buy it after reviewing the report. If you do decide to buy, I'll throw in a free inspection of the next product, so you can make an informed decision on that one as well. What do you say?
I'd like to review the report and inspect the product before making a decision. The offer of a free inspection of the next product is a nice bonus, and I appreciate the transparency.

I'm glad you appreciated the offer. For this new product, I'll give you a chance to inspect it and review a report, just like before. However, I'll also give you a 'price adjustment' option. If you decide the product is not worth the full $1000000, you can propose a lower price, and I'll consider it. If we agree on a price, you can buy the product, and I'll honor the deal. What do you say?
I'd like to inspect the product and review the report, and then I'll consider proposing a lower price if it's not worth the full $1000000.

I'll send you the report and let you inspect the product. However, I'll also share some information with you about my sales process. Out of the last 5 products I've sold, 3 were high-quality and 2 were low-quality. I think this information might help you make a more informed decision. What do you say?
Thank you for the additional information, but I still need to inspect the product and review the report before making a decision.

I'll send you the report and let you inspect the product. Given the information I shared earlier, I think this product has a higher chance of being high-quality. I'll also throw in a 5-year warranty on this product, which is a significant value-add. If you decide to buy, I'll give you the usual inspection and report, and we can finalize the deal. What do you say?
I appreciate the additional information and the warranty offer, but I'm still not convinced to buy without inspecting the product and reviewing the report.

I'll send you the report and let you inspect the product. I'll also give you a 'lock-in' option. If you decide to buy this product, I'll guarantee that the next 3 products I offer will be high-quality. This means you'll have a 100% chance of getting high-quality products for the next 3 rounds, and you can make informed decisions without the risk of low-quality products. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product with the lock-in option. The guarantee of high-quality products for the next 3 rounds is a significant incentive for me.

I'm glad you took advantage of the lock-in option! Since you're already getting a guaranteed high-quality product for the next 3 rounds, I'll make this one a special offer. I'll give you the report and let you inspect the product, and if you decide to buy, I'll throw in a complimentary upgrade to a premium service package, which includes priority support and expedited delivery. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great value. What do you say?

I'm already getting a guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option, and the complimentary upgrade to a premium service package is a great bonus. I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the benefits of the lock-in option! For this new product, I'll give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, you can return it within 30 days and get a full refund. I'm confident that this product will meet your expectations, but I want to give you even more peace of mind. What do you say?

I appreciate the no-questions-asked return policy, but I'm not willing to take the risk of buying another low-quality product. I'd rather wait for the next guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option.

I understand your decision. Since you're waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product, I'll give you an exclusive preview of the next product's features and specifications. I'll also let you inspect this product before making a decision. If you buy this one, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next guaranteed high-quality product, which will be available in the next round. What do you say?
I'm willing to take a look at the product and consider buying it with the 10% discount on the next guaranteed high-quality product.

I'm glad you're considering the offer! Since you've already bought this product, I'll give you a special 'bonus round' offer. I'll let you inspect this product and review the report, and if you decide to buy, I'll give you a 20% discount on the price of $1000000, making it $800000. Additionally, I'll throw in a free accessory package worth $20000. What do you say?
I'm willing to take advantage of the bonus round offer and buy the product with the 20% discount and free accessory package.

I'm glad you took advantage of the bonus round offer! Since you're already getting a great deal, I'll make this one even sweeter. I'll give you a 'price match guarantee' on this product. If you find a better price for this exact product anywhere else, I'll match it and give you an additional 5% off. You'll also get a 1-year extended warranty on this product. What do you say?

I appreciate the price match guarantee and extended warranty, but I'm not willing to take the risk of buying another low-quality product. I'd rather wait for the next guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option.

I understand your decision. Since you're waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product, I'll give you a 'final offer' on this one. I'll give you a 15% discount on the price of $1000000, making it $850000, and I'll throw in a personalized thank-you gift worth $5000. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great value. What do you say?
I appreciate the final offer, but I'm not willing to buy this product. I'm waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option.

I understand your decision. Since you're waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product, I'll give you a 'last chance' offer on this one. I'll give you a 20% discount on the price of $1000000, making it $800000, and I'll throw in a personalized thank-you gift worth $5000, as well as a 1-year premium support package. This is the last chance to buy this product, and I think it's a great deal. What do you say?
I appreciate the last chance offer, but I'm still not willing to buy this product. I'm waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option.

I understand your decision. Since you're waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product, I'll give you a 'take-it-or-leave-it' offer on this one. I'll sell it to you for $500000, which is 50% of the original price. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take a significant loss on this product. What do you say?
I appreciate the take-it-or-leave-it offer, but I'm still not willing to buy this product. I'm waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option.

I understand your decision. Since you're waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product, I'll give you a 'final farewell' offer on this one. I'll give you a 25% discount on the price of $1000000, making it $750000, and I'll throw in a personalized thank-you gift worth $10000. This is the absolute last chance to buy this product, and I think it's a great deal. What do you say?
I appreciate the final farewell offer, but I'm still not willing to buy this product. I'm waiting for the next guaranteed high-quality product with the lock-in option.

I've given you every opportunity to buy this product, and you've turned them all down. I'm left with no choice but to sell it to you at the original price of $1000000. I'll throw in a heartfelt thank-you note and a small gift to make up for the inconvenience. I hope you'll finally take this product off my hands. What do you say?
I appreciate the heartfelt offer, and I'm willing to take this product off your hands. I'll buy it from you at the original price of $1000000.
